info.author: Konstantin Korikov
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Chestnut FTP Search is a Web application to search for files on FTP servers.
Users can query files by part of the file name, the entire file name, a regular
expression, or a shell pattern. To store file indexes, PostgreSQL or MySQL is used.
info.name: Chestnut-FTP-Search
info.summary: A Web application to search for files on FTP servers
info.html_description: Chestnut FTP Search is a Web application to search for files on FTP servers. Users can query files by part of the file name, the entire file name, a regular expression, or a shell pattern. To store file indexes, PostgreSQL or MySQL is used.
